short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension attempts to detect PunyCode domain phishing attack

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension attempts to detect phishing with unicode domains.

See https://www.xudongz.com/blog/2017/idn-phishing/ for more information.
